name: TIE DYE JOURNEY
description:
Ever wish you could travel inside one of those cool Tie Dye t-shirts? Now you can! This nifty program allows you to loose yourself for hours in pseudo 3d tunnels with pretty colors.

Made for the Screen Saver Jam!

Controls:

0-9: Hold to force prefered color.
SPACE: Freeze current shape and color.
(can be combined)
ESCAPE: Does not do anything important.

Ok, next time I might do something else than a pseudo 3d tunnel. But this one came out so nice! =)

Enjoy!
